abstract: Many pundits have proffered explanations for the Wall Street crisis. Now William D. Cohan, author of “The Last Tycoons” and a former investment banker, offers his own: the sometimes astonishing paychecks.
lead_paragraph: Many pundits have proffered explanations for the Wall Street crisis. Now William D. Cohan, author of “The Last Tycoons” and a former investment banker, offers his own: the sometimes astonishing paychecks.
